description: Whistleblower documents reveal suspicious activities by key Council members, increasing internal distrust.
Public demonstrations intensify as leaked information highlights Council's internal corruption, demanding immediate accountability.
A whistleblower within the Council provides evidence of internal sabotage linked to high-ranking members.
A trusted system administrator is detained for questioning after incriminating logs are discovered.
Analysis reveals deliberate system manipulation by two influential Council members, escalating the crisis.
Public outrage peaks as high-level corruption within Stenograd's leadership is exposed, igniting calls for reform.
